import Web3 from'web3';import mailContractData from'./DecentralizedMail.json';let web3;let mailContract;if(window.ethereum){web3=new Web3(window.ethereum);try{// Request account access if needed
window.ethereum.enable();}catch(error){console.error("User denied account access");}}else if(window.web3){// Legacy dapp browsers...
web3=new Web3(window.web3.currentProvider);}else{// Non-dapp browsers...
const provider=new Web3.providers.HttpProvider('https://public-node.testnet.rsk.co');web3=new Web3(provider);}const networkId='31';// RSK Testnet network ID
const deployedNetwork=mailContractData.networks[networkId];mailContract=new web3.eth.Contract(mailContractData.abi,deployedNetwork&&deployedNetwork.address);export{web3,mailContract};
